name: motored
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
motor
informal to move or increase very quickly: Shares have motored ahead as profits have risen.
UK old-fashioned to drive: I was just motoring along, minding my own business, when suddenly I was stopped by the police.
